revised_title: Rutherford's Legacy and the Development of Atomic Theory
tldr: This article discusses the significance of Rutherford's work in the development of atomic theory and nuclear physics. It highlights the background of knowledge at the time Rutherford began his research and how his discoveries revolutionized our understanding of the atomic structure of matter. The article also emphasizes the importance of looking at Rutherford's work against the backdrop of the existing understanding of classical physics.
